content: I was thinking of getting a beginner's enlarger and some printing paper. But I'm not sure about the chemicals and the process of developing the prints. Do you know of any online resources or tutorials that can walk me through the process step-by-step, maybe something that's geared towards beginners? By the way, I'm really interested in capturing the city's transformation, like the exhibition I saw at the Local History Museum, so I'm hoping to experiment with some urban photography projects.
